body: After reading this multiple times, my mind still can't make up what the plot is. Like, wtf?
Interesting concept... bad writing. Difficult to follow

@daruma02 I believe Kotone always loved Akane, maybe to the point of wanting to rape her, but she was always embarrassed about it, it was because of Takuya's influence that gave Kotone the enough courage to rape Akane.

So takuya is the boy who steal Kotone body. after he doing it he split kotone (spirit) to his own body(Takuya). so now inside kotone body only takuya(spirit) there.  next bcz kotone(spirit) being tranfer to takuya body, she is being corrupt by takuya body, so thats why kotone want to steal akane body later?? OMG sorry for my bad english hahaha
A surprise to be sure, but a welcome one.

Hmm... not bad... At first it nearly piss me off that he split her out from her body to locked her suffer in man's body.
& then he decide her to steal Akane's body & live her in that way instead.
But I'd rather have her wear back in her own skin & merge instead of steal Akane's body like chapter 2.
But nvm, I'll see how's Kotone gonna do with Akane's body & what Akane will become... merge or turn into him instead.

@your personal FBI agent Haven't read the translated versions of the previous chapters but judging from the skinsuit tag I'd say that's him skullfucking the girl he turned into the skinsuit, something to that nature.
Can somebody tell me what's that face or something at page 2 upper left supposed to be?
Alright, looks like next chapter is coming this March (last page says "to be continued つづく"). But still, this chapter felt pretty short.
WARNING: this series is pretty fucked up
